#include "auth.h"
#include "utils.h"
#include <openssl/sha.h>
#include <fstream>
#include <sstream>
#include <random>
#include <algorithm>

namespace Auth {
    std::string generateSalt() {
        const char charset[] = "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
        const size_t saltLength = 16;
        std::random_device rd;
        std::mt19937 gen(rd());
        std::uniform_int_distribution<> dis(0, sizeof(charset) - 2);
        
        std::string salt;
        for (size_t i = 0; i < saltLength; ++i) {
            salt += charset[dis(gen)];
        }
        return salt;
    }
    
    std::string generateHash(const std::string& password, const std::string& salt) {
        std::string salted = password + salt;
        unsigned char hash[SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH];
        SHA256(reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(salted.c_str()), salted.length(), hash);
        return Utils::toHex(hash, SHA256_DIGEST_LENGTH);
    }
    
    bool userExists(const std::string& username) {
        std::string content = Utils::readFile("data/users.json");
        if (content.empty()) {
            return false;
        }
        
        // Simple search for username in JSON
        std::string searchStr = ""username":"" + username + """;
        return content.find(searchStr) != std::string::npos;
    }
    
    bool registerUser(const std::string& username, const std::string& password) {
        if (userExists(username)) {
            return false;
        }
        
        std::string salt = generateSalt();
        std::string hash = generateHash(password, salt);
        
        // Read existing users
        std::string content = Utils::readFile("data/users.json");
        if (content.empty() || content == "[]" || content == "[
]") {
            content = "[]";
        }
        
        // Build new user entry
        std::stringstream newEntry;
        newEntry << "{"username":"" << username << "","
                 << ""salt":"" << salt << "","
                 << ""hash":"" << hash << ""}";
        
        // Insert into array
        if (content == "[]") {
            content = "[" + newEntry.str() + "]";
        } else {
            // Remove closing bracket, add comma and new entry
            size_t pos = content.rfind(']');
            if (pos != std::string::npos) {
                content = content.substr(0, pos);
                // Check if array is empty or has entries
                bool isEmpty = (content.find('{') == std::string::npos);
                if (!isEmpty) {
                    content += ",";
                }
                content += newEntry.str() + "]";
            }
        }
        
        Utils::writeFile("data/users.json", content);
        return true;
    }
    
    bool loginUser(const std::string& username, const std::string& password) {
        std::string content = Utils::readFile("data/users.json");
        if (content.empty()) {
            return false;
        }
        
        // Parse JSON manually to find user
        std::string searchStr = ""username":"" + username + """;
        size_t userPos = content.find(searchStr);
        if (userPos == std::string::npos) {
            return false;
        }
        
        // Find the object containing this username
        size_t objStart = content.rfind('{', userPos);
        size_t objEnd = content.find('}', userPos);
        if (objStart == std::string::npos || objEnd == std::string::npos) {
            return false;
        }
        
        std::string userObj = content.substr(objStart, objEnd - objStart + 1);
        
        // Extract salt
        std::string saltKey = ""salt":"";
        size_t saltPos = userObj.find(saltKey);
        if (saltPos == std::string::npos) {
            return false;
        }
        saltPos += saltKey.length();
        size_t saltEnd = userObj.find(""", saltPos);
        std::string salt = userObj.substr(saltPos, saltEnd - saltPos);
        
        // Extract hash
        std::string hashKey = ""hash":"";
        size_t hashPos = userObj.find(hashKey);
        if (hashPos == std::string::npos) {
            return false;
        }
        hashPos += hashKey.length();
        size_t hashEnd = userObj.find(""", hashPos);
        std::string storedHash = userObj.substr(hashPos, hashEnd - hashPos);
        
        // Verify password
        std::string computedHash = generateHash(password, salt);
        return computedHash == storedHash;
    }
    
    void saveSession(const std::string& username) {
        std::string sessionData = "{"last_user": "" + username + ""}";
        Utils::writeFile("logs/session_state.json", sessionData);
    }
}
#include "auth.h"
#include "utils.h"
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>

void showBanner() {
    std::cout << "=== Chat App v1.0.0 ===" << std::endl;
}

void showMenu() {
    std::cout << "[1] Register" << std::endl;
    std::cout << "[2] Login" << std::endl;
    std::cout << "[3] Exit" << std::endl;
}

void handleRegister() {
    std::string username, password, password2;
    
    std::cout << "Username: ";
    std::getline(std::cin, username);
    
    std::cout << "Password: ";
    std::getline(std::cin, password);
    
    std::cout << "Password: ";
    std::getline(std::cin, password2);
    
    if (password != password2) {
        std::cout << "Passwords do not match" << std::endl;
        return;
    }
    
    if (Auth::registerUser(username, password)) {
        std::cout << "Registration successful" << std::endl;
        Auth::saveSession(username);
    } else {
        std::cout << "Username already exists" << std::endl;
    }
}

void handleLogin() {
    std::string username, password;
    
    std::cout << "Username: ";
    std::getline(std::cin, username);
    
    std::cout << "Password: ";
    std::getline(std::cin, password);
    
    if (Auth::loginUser(username, password)) {
        std::cout << "Welcome " << username << std::endl;
        Auth::saveSession(username);
    } else {
        std::cout << "Invalid credentials" << std::endl;
    }
}

int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
    // Handle --version flag
    if (argc == 2 && std::strcmp(argv[1], "--version") == 0) {
        std::cout << "1.0.0" << std::endl;
        return 0;
    }
    
    // Initialize data/users.json if it doesn't exist
    std::string usersContent = Utils::readFile("data/users.json");
    if (usersContent.empty()) {
        Utils::writeFile("data/users.json", "[]");
    }
    
    showBanner();
    
    while (true) {
        showMenu();
        std::cout << "Action: ";
        
        std::string choice;
        std::getline(std::cin, choice);
        
        if (choice == "1") {
            handleRegister();
        } else if (choice == "2") {
            handleLogin();
        } else if (choice == "3") {
            break;
        } else {
            std::cout << "Invalid choice" << std::endl;
        }
    }
    
    return 0;
}
